name: Leaf Blast
symptoms: White to gray-green lesions or spots with dark borders.
organic_cure: Spray Neeam oil 3%. Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizer.
chemical_cure: Spray Tricyclazole 75 WP @ 0.6g/liter or Carbendazim 50 WP @ 1g/liter.
prevention: Use resistant varieties and treat seeds with Pseudomonas fluorescens.

name: Brown Spot
symptoms: Round to oval dark-brown spots on leaves.
organic_cure: Spray mixture of cow urine and water (1:10).
prevention: Proper crop nutrition and soil health management.

name: Bacterial Blight
symptoms: Water-soaked streaks on leaf blades, turning yellow.
organic_cure: Spray fresh cow dung slurry extract.
prevention: Secure disease-free seeds and keep fields clean.

name: Healthy
symptoms: Plant looks vibrant green with no spots.
prevention: Maintain regular watering and fertilization schedule.
